ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen concentrated grapefruit juice, thawed
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen white grape juice concentrate, thawed
des: "This soda syrup is reminiscent of IzzeÂ® Sparkling Grapefruit drink.  Just add plain soda water for a refreshing treat."
ins: Mix the grapefruit juice and white grape juice concentrates in a 1-quart pitcher until thoroughly combined. Store mixture in refrigerator. To serve, pour 1/3 cup of concentrate mix into a glass, and mix with 1 cup of cold club soda or sparkling water.
